ui_doctor.all: SELECT `data_doctor`.`sid`, `data_doctor`.`id`, `data_doctor`.`name`, `data_doctor_lv_meta`.`data` AS `lv`, `data_doctor`.`avatar`, `data_doctor`.`date`, `data_doctor_ext`.`dod`, `data_doctor_ext`.`dlv`, `data_doctor_ext`.`star`, `data_doctor_ext`.`hot`, `data_doctor_ext`.`love`, `data_doctor_ext`.`contribution`, `data_doctor_ext`.`desc`, `data_doctor_ext`.`spec`, CONV(`data_doctor_ext`.`duty`,10,4) as `duty` FROM `data_doctor` LEFT JOIN `data_doctor_ext` ON `data_doctor`.`sid` = `data_doctor_ext`.`dod` LEFT JOIN `data_doctor_lv_meta` ON `data_doctor_lv_meta`.`sid` = `data_doctor_ext`.`dlv`
